channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Supreme Court Signals It Will Uphold TikTok Ban (Live Updates)
item.description: The court is expected to rule on the ban’s fate before it takes effect Jan. 19.

item.title: The magic of the commons

item.title: Busy-ness and leverage
item.description: When I made breakfast this morning, I didn’t begin by making the blender. Someone else, a team with more skills, resources and scale, built the blende...

item.title: Navigating The Digital Frontier: The Security Of Modern Applications
item.description: The security of applications is not just a technical issue but a cornerstone of business integrity and continuity.

item.title: ‘Destiny 2’ Unveils Its Best Halloween Armor In History
item.description: There is not much to be positive about with Destiny 2 these days, but when I see a glimmer of something good, I feel like I should spotlight it.

item.title: The value of artifacts

item.title: Modern Games Like Starfield Need Better Opening Lines
item.description: Some games are not fun until you’ve invested hours. The gaming industry could learn from the way fiction writers craft their opening lines.

item.title: Situational spending

item.title: Supply Chain Control Tower: The Next Frontier To Deliver AI And Digital Twins
item.description: A supply chain control tower may look different for every business, depending on its focus.
